item.title: Relationship between Age and the party people support
item.description: Abstract This piece of work uses the rmarkdown as a tool to develop the variables and observers in the 2019 Canadian General Election Introduction In the 2019 election, the survey showed that the support for the Liberal and Conservative Party are approximately the same. Among those group people, I mainly focus the variable of year of birth and the federal party that they support. In the graph, one thing that we can conclude is that the survey focused more on the people who are 40 years old or more and the statistics itself is biased.
